name: Fly High (itch) (enDevour)
description:
GameJam theme: ONE BUTTON

GAME CONTROL:

Space to JUMP                                   Hold space to fly

GAME MECHANICS:

- Dodge the fire obstacles to live and gain score

- Gain more score by collecting coins

This is my first ever finished game it is not the best but it is 2d endless running game  where you play as a bird with low flying skills. Just avoid the obstacles and live as long as you can.

Mouse Cursor is not disable so you can use the mouse to click the exit button at the upper right and you can also click the how to play button in case you forgot the mechanics.

The ground, grass, fire sprites are mine but the rest are not mine. Credits to the owner.

THANK YOU FOR READING THIS NOW LET SEE IF YOU CAN SCORE FOR AT LEAST 100 IN THIS GAME. I CHALLEGE YOU!!! LEZGOO
